document.title: Hot Topic: Stimulus Law Affecting COBRA Extended Until May 31, 2010
document.abstract: Workers who were involuntarily terminated between September 1, 2008 and May 31, 2010 are eligible for up to 15 months of COBRA premium assistance.

field.name: comments
field.value:
